lead_paragraph: Euro 2016 hosts France will play home friendlies against Cameroon and Scotland in the build-up to this year's tournament, the French Football Federation said on Monday.

headline.print_headline: France to Play Cameroon and Scotland in Euro 2016 Warm-Ups
headline.main: France to Play Cameroon and Scotland in Euro 2016 Warm-Ups
